attributes.action: PUBLIC INQUIRY for the vicitims of NHS Contaminated Blood Products
attributes.additional_details:
2000 British patients have been killed as a direct result of being injected with contaminated NHS treatment, amounting to mass genocide.

In the 1970's and 1980's,  5000 trusting Haemophilia patients were infected with Hepatitis C through their NHS treatment. 1200 of those were also infected with HIV.

Against overwhelming evidence, no fault has ever been admitted by any department or individual.

The surviving victims having to live with these life-threatening infections and their families, are still waiting for answers as to what happened, over 30 years on.

By signing this petition, you will be giving hope to the surviving victims and their families by securing a full Public Inquiry for them - thank you.
